ImportHttpApi.summary: Imports HTTP APIs. You can call this operation to import OpenAPI 2.0 and OpenAPI 3.0.x definition files to create REST APIs.

specContentBase64.title: Bse64编码的API定义，支持OAS2.0和OAS3.0规范，支持YAML格式和JSON格式。
specContentBase64.description: The Base64-encoded API definition. OAS 2.0 and OAS 3.0 specifications are supported. YAML and JSON formats are supported. This parameter precedes over the specFileUrl parameter. However, if the file size exceeds 10 MB, use the specFileUrl parameter to pass the definition.

specFileUrl.title: OAS文件的下载地址，需要支持免验证下载。优先级低于specContentBase64字段。
specFileUrl.description: The download URL of the API definition file. You can download the file over the Internet or by using an Object Storage Service (OSS) internal download URL that belongs to the current region. You must obtain the required permissions to download the file. For OSS URLs that are not publicly readable, refer to https://help.aliyun.com/zh/oss/user-guide/how-to-obtain-the-url-of-a-single-object-or-the-urls-of-multiple-objects to specify URLs that provide download permissions. Currently, only OSS URLs are supported.

name.title: API名称。
name.description: The API name. If you do not specify a name, a name is extracted from the definition file. If a name and a versioning configuration already exist, the existing API definition is updated based on the strategy field.

description.title: API描述。
description.description: The API description, which cannot exceed 255 bytes in length. If you do not specify a description, a description is extracted from the definition file.

dryRun.title: 预检功能，不进行导入只检查Swagger定义。
dryRun.description: Specifies whether to perform a dry run. If this parameter is set to true, a dry run is performed without importing the file.

strategy.title: 导入时的冲突合并策略，为空默ExistFirst
strategy.description:
The update policy when the API to be imported has the same version and name as an existing one. Valid values:

*   SpectOnly: All configurations in the file take effect.
*   SpecFirst: The file takes precedence. New APIs are created and existing ones are updated. APIs not included in the file remain unchanged.
*   ExistFirst (default): The existing APIs take precedence. New APIs are created but existing ones remain unchanged.

targetHttpApiId.title: 导入覆盖指定的HTTP API。若指定该字段，则name和versionConfig字段失效。
targetHttpApiId.description: The API to be updated. If this parameter is specified, this import updates only the specified API. New APIs are not created and unspecified existing APIs are not updated. Only REST APIs can be specified.

objectKey.description: The full path of the file.

successOperations.description: The operations that pass the dry run.

action.description:
The action that will be performed for the operation after the dry run.

*   Create: The operation is created.
*   Update: The operation is updated.

method.description: The HTTP method of the operation.

failureOperations.description: The operations that fail the dry run.

method.description: The HTTP method of the operation.

successComponents.description: The data structs that pass the dry run.

action.description:
The action that will be performed for the data struct after the dry run.

*   Create: The data struct is created.
*   Update: The data struct is updated.

failureComponents.description: The data structs that fail the dry run.

errorMessage.example: The data struct is incorrectly defined.

errorMessages.description: The error messages. If an error message is returned, the API fails to be imported.

warningMessages.description: The alerts. If an alert is returned, specific operations or structs may fail to be imported.

items.example: Parameter definition is incomplete for GET /v1/orders.

existHttpApiInfo.description: The existing APIs. If an existing API is returned, the import updates the existing API.

routeId.description: Route ID. This must be provided when publishing the route of an HTTP API.

restApiConfig.description: Rest API deployment configuration. Required when deploying an HTTP API as a Rest API.

revisionId.description: Historical version number. If this field is specified, the publication information will be based on the historical version information.

serviceConfigs.description: Existing service configurations. Only one entry is allowed in a single-service scenario, while multiple entries are allowed in scenarios such as by ratio or by content.

port.description: Service port, do not provide for dynamic ports.

weight.description: Weight, range [1,100], valid only in the by-ratio scenario.

match.description: Configuration of matching conditions related to API deployment.

schema.description: The information about the API to be created.

protocols.title: API访问协议。

basePath.title: API基础路径，需要以/开头。

type.description:

overrideIngressIp.description: Specifies whether to update the address in Ingress Status.

aiProtocols.description:
The AI API protocols. Valid value:

deployConfigs.description: The API deployment configurations. Currently, only AI APIs support deployment configurations, and only a single deployment configuration can be passed.

The deployment state of the route.

GetService.summary: Queries the details of a service.
GetService.title: GetService

sourceType.description:
The service source. Valid values:

*   MSE_NACOS: a service in an MSE Nacos instance
*   K8S: a service in a Kubernetes (K8s) cluster in Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK)
*   VIP: a fixed IP address
*   DNS: a Domain Name System (DNS) domain name
*   FC3: a service in Function Compute
*   SAE_K8S_SERVICE: a service in a K8s cluster in Serverless App Engine (SAE)

Enumerated values:

*   SAE_K8S_SERVICE
*   K8S
*   FC3
*   DNS
*   VIP
*   MSE_NACOS

namespace.description:
The service namespace. This parameter is required when sourceType is set to K8S or MSE_NACOS.

*   If sourceType is set to K8S, this parameter specifies the namespace where the K8s service resides.
*   If sourceType is set to MSE_NACOS, this parameter specifies a namespace in Nacos.

groupName.description: The service group name. This parameter is required if sourceType is set to MSE_NACOS.

addresses.description: The list of domain names or fixed addresses.

items.description: The domain name or fixed address.

dnsServers.description: The list of DNS service addresses.

Gateway status:

- CreateFailed: Creation failed.
- Upgrading: Upgrading.
- UpgradeFailed: Upgrade failed.
- Restarting: Restarting.
- RestartFailed: Restart failed.
- Deleting: Deleting.
- DeleteFailed: Deletion failed.

expireTimestamp.description: Expiration timestamp for subscription. Unit: milliseconds.

createFrom.description:
Source of gateway creation:

targetVersion.description: Target version of the gateway. When it is inconsistent with the current version, an upgrade can be performed.

environments.description: List of environments associated with the gateway.

securityGroup.description: The security group of the gateway.

vSwitch.description: The virtual switch associated with the gateway.

vpc.description: The VPC (Virtual Private Cloud) associated with the gateway.

zones.description: List of availability zones associated with the gateway.

loadBalancers.description: List of entry addresses for the gateway.

addressType.description:
Load balancer address type:
- Internet: Public.

status.description:
The status of the load balancer:
- Ready: Available.

type.description:
The type of load balancer:
- NLB: Network Load Balancer.
- CLB: Classic Load Balancer.

address.description: The address of the load balancer.

addressIpVersion.description:
The IP version of the protocol:
- ipv4: IPv4 type.
- ipv6: IPv6 type.

mode.description:
The provision mode of the load balancer for the gateway:

gatewayDefault.description: Whether it is the default entry address for the gateway.

resourceGroupId.description: The ID of the resource group.

key.description: The tag key of the resource.

value.description: The tag value of the resource.

status.description:
The instance state. Valid values:

*   Running: The instance is running.
*   Creating: The instance is being created.
*   CreateFailed: The instance fails to be created.
*   Upgrading: The instance is being upgraded.
*   UpgradeFailed: The instance fails to be upgraded.
*   Restarting: The instance is being restarted.
*   RestartFailed: The instance fails to be restarted.
*   Deleting: The instance is being released.
*   DeleteFailed: The instance failed to be released.

spec.description:
The instance specification. Valid values:

replicas.description: The node quantity of the instance.

createTimestamp.description: The time when the instance was created. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

updateTimestamp.description: The time when the instance was last updated. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

expireTimestamp.description: The time when the instance expires. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

createFrom.description:
The creation source of the instance. Valid values:

targetVersion.description: The destination version of the instance. If the value is inconsistent with the current version, you can upgrade the instance.

loadBalancers.description: The ingress addresses of the instance.

addressType.description:
The address type. Valid values:

*   Internet
*   Intranet

type.description:
The load balancer type. Valid values:

*   CLB: Classic Load Balancer

status.description:

*   Ready: The load balancer is available.

addressIpVersion.description:
The IP version of the address. Valid values:

*   ipv6: IPv6

mode.description:
The mode in which the load balancer is provided. Valid values:

gatewayDefault.description: Indicates whether the address is the default ingress address of the instance.

protocol.description:
The protocol. Valid values:

*   UDP

securityGroup.description: The security group information about the instance.

zones.description: The availability zones of the instance.

schema.description:

- Domain: Gateway domain.
